attributes.action: Introduce a fair rent policy for people living in private accommodation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Landlords are buying up all the low cost properties and renting them out. Not only does this practice take out affordable properties for first time buyers, but Some rents charged are way too high and leaves little if any to for the tenant to put aside for buying a home of their own in the future.
